name: Diggers (itch)
description:
A multiplayer game for two or more players in the genre of roguelike digger. You can also go through the plot alone without an Internet connection.

In the future. Deep underground, a portal was found from where strangers began to appear. The aliens decided to take over the Earth and enslave the earthlings. Then a detachment of professional miners was assembled, who were assigned the mission to bury a hostile portal on the nearest planet. The main task is to bury the portal below the 10th layer.
